segments.text: Yes . I'd like a hamburger and a large order of french fries , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . And would you like a salad ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'll have a mixed green salad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . What kind of dressing would you like ? We have vinaigrette , Italian , and French .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And would you like anything to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like a large soda , please .
segments.speaker: S2
